remarks: Lemma to prove downward closure in positive real addition.  Part of proof of Proposition 9-3.5 of [Gleason] p. 123.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-1996.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: addclprlem1 $p |- ( ( ( A e. P. /\ g e. A ) /\ x e. Q. ) -> ( x <Q ( g +Q h ) -> ( ( x .Q ( *Q ` ( g +Q h ) ) ) .Q g ) e. A ) ) $.
